wikipedia_page.main: Henry Abbott (15 March 1895 – 1968) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Nelson, Luton Town and Rochdale. He also played for newly formed Wigan Athletic in their inaugural season.

response: *Harry Abbott (footballer, born 1883) (1883–?), inside forward for Bolton Wanderers
*Harry Abbott (footballer, born 1895) (1895–1968), goalkeeper who played more than 200 Football League matches
